name: SuperStar Fashion Girl Spa Salon - Makeover Make Up & Dress Up - Teen Girl Game
name_original: SuperStar Fashion Girl Spa Salon - Makeover Make Up & Dress Up - Teen Girl Game
description:
Give the girl a rock salon? She is a super girl and if you like the spa salon game, i think you must be a super rock star too.

Nowadays,pop stars and super celebrity spa salon always around our world,they have been our indispensable part of girls' life.Our this new super celebrity spa salon game shows a nice,beautiful and different feelings to girls. Their hairstyles,makeup and dress up are very delicate,you can dress up yourself like a super celebrity.

decorate, girl by giving her a lovely manicure and pedicure.complete her look by changing her eye colour and applying makeup including lipstick, blush, eyeliner, eye-shadow, and eyelash colour. Enjoy this awesome game..
